name: Bunny Hunt
description:
The cycle of life. Those who are hunters must become preys. Those who are preys must become hunters. Collect 10 points to swap roles. 

WASD to move. 

Credits: scavenger, straawberri_miilk, Shogun, OMEGA, robo kitty. All assets and code utilized in the program were created from scratch by the GOHS Game Design Club.
